Te Whakatōhea, Ngāti Porou, Ngāi Tūhoe. I am a BSc(Hons) in Psychology student at Te Herenga Waka—Victoria University of Wellington. My research interests range across all kinds of kaupapa Māori, including Māori identity and wellbeing.
